summary: The module provides a complete example script for fine‑tuning the Stable Diffusion XL text‑to‑image diffusion model. It parses training arguments, loads and preprocesses a dataset, imports the model components, sets up the optimizer, learning‑rate scheduler and optional EMA, runs a distributed training loop with checkpointing and optional logging, and saves the resulting model and model card.
business_intent: Allow developers and researchers to adapt a large pre‑trained text‑to‑image diffusion model to their own visual domains, improving generation relevance and quality for specialized applications such as marketing, design, or content creation.
